nodes.text: Foxtrot Group was an elite squad of clone commandos that was attached to the 212th Attack Battalion during the Clone Wars. Led by Clone Captain CC-5576-39, "Gregor," the unit was reported missing in action at the Battle of Sarrish. Despite the mounting casualties, Captain Gregor was able to survive and somehow ended up in a crashed transport on the planet Abafar, suffering from amnesia.
Foxtrot Group was first mentioned in CC-5576-39's military records in "Missing in Action," the twelfth episode of the canon animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' fifth season.
